sourceDesc.p: TEI-page files converted by Python to TEI-entry file

div.p: STO EBE, bastard æthiopian, in botany: A genus of plants belonging to the claſs of ſyngenesia, and order of polygamia ſegregata ; and in the natural ſyſtem ranging under the 49th order, compositae. The calycle is uniflorous ; the corollets are tubular and hermaphrodite ; the receptacle is naked, and the pappus is feathery. There are nine ſpecies, the æthiopica, ericoides, proſtrata, gnaphaloides, gomphrenoides, ſcabra, reflexa, rhinocerotis, and diſticha ; all plants of foreign growth.
